CLI data download

A simple example app to aid download of data from remote sources

usage: CLI-DATA-DOWNLOAD [-h] --portal {CEDA,HADOBS} --dataset
                         {CRUTEM,HADCRUT}

Named Arguments

--portal

Possible choices: CEDA, HADOBS

Data source portal

--dataset

Possible choices: CRUTEM, HADCRUT

Dataset to be downloaded

—
